Title: Man carrying DMRC's Rs. 50 lakh goes missing
Content: A cash collection agent hired by Delhi Metro Rail Corporation for made off with Rs. 50 lakh cash, collected as fares from seven metro stations, on Tuesday afternoon. A case has been registered at the
Author: Shubhomoy Sikdhar
